name: Force (Blastherominer)
description:
Welcome to Force.

You play as a tiny red cube in a small little box, applying forces to yourself to navigate around, trying to get to a hole in the box. Although, there are obstacles in your way.

There are 11 levels to this game, they all very in difficulty.

Thanks to all the cool developers who pushed me to release my first ever 3d game in Unity.

Controls:

Mash buttons to apply forces.

W-up 

A-left

S-down

D-right.

#Dani #Two Star #Dev Banana
